author: pedro
msg: - Preventing the submit link input name from being encoded in form action. This change makes more sense in 1.4 where POST parameters are considered page parameters. But nothing stops users from send this parameter as a GET one, and nothing blocks us from start consider POST parameters as page parameters.
- Hidden input name changed to be root form relative

author: markt
msg: Once the application has finished writing to the response, prevent further reads from the request since this causes various problems in the connectors which do not expect this.

author: pburba
msg: Create a 1.6.x backport branch for the issue #3641 group.
